Text: dont work, install instructions simple and clear, program needs serial

It works, when you install the patch it will ask for serial. Don't click it yet. First browse to your game accelerator folder and delete the gamexl file. Then put the activator in the game accelerator directory and double click. A message will pop up along with some fruity music and click the activate button. Once it says patching done you can exit. After that run the patch and it will not ask for serial and it will the say the patching was successful. A new gamexl will be in the directory. Run the program and it will be like you bought the program. No more nag screens and all the features. I can now run S.T.A.L.K.E.R without lag but the graphics get crappy :(
